core

Class EmergencyDepartment

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.EmergencyDepartment

  • public class EmergencyDepartment
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the whole emergency department. It stores all its entities and coordinates everything.
    Author:
    Thomas

      • executeNextTask

        public void executeNextTask()
        This method searches the next task to execute among the services of the Emergency Department and the next patient arrival, then executes it and update the global time.

        public Task getNextPatientArrival()
        Calculate the time of the next arrival of a patient, generate the patient and return the corresponding task
        Returns:
        the task corresponding to the arrival of the next patient

      • getAvailableRoom

        public Room getAvailableRoom(java.lang.String roomType)
        This method searches an available room of a given type and return it if found, or null if there isn't one
        Parameters:
        roomType - a string representing the type of the room
        Returns:
        an available room of the given type if there is one, null otherwise
